title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1\PreprocessingConfig\Color
name: Color
description:
Color preprocessing configuration.

Note: This configuration is not supported.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1.PreprocessingConfig.Color

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.saturation
params.description: Control color saturation of the video. Enter a value between -1 and 1, where -1 is fully desaturated and 1 is maximum saturation. 0 is no change. The default is 0.

params.name: data.contrast
params.description: Control black and white contrast of the video. Enter a value between -1 and 1, where -1 is minimum contrast and 1 is maximum contrast. 0 is no change. The default is 0.

params.name: data.brightness
params.description: Control brightness of the video. Enter a value between -1 and 1, where -1 is minimum brightness and 1 is maximum brightness. 0 is no change. The default is 0.

methods.description:
